ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: hi I need help
ygData.msgSnippet: They are correct a bard is hard but if you don t do it you will always wonder what if, it will be quicker in the long run to do what you want and get it out of
ygData.messageBody:
They are correct a bard is hard but if you don't do
it you will always wonder what if, it will be quicker
in the long run to do what you want and get it out of
your system. LOL.. Might I suggest tho if you want
to try races and classes out you can start a toon on
the test server. type /testbuff and bam you got a
decent geared toon thats lv 25. You can play with him
and get a feel for the class and you don't loose a
week or so getting up in your mid 20s and then finding
out you don't like it.
My 2 copper Hogg
